Body:
points = Vector2D.from_coordinates((0.1, 10.1), (-0.1, 10.9), (0.1, 20.1),
    (0, 30), (15.1, 30.1), (30, 30), (29.9, 10.0), (30, 0), (15.1, 0.1), (0, 0)
    )
polygon = Polygon2D(*points)
simplified_polygon = polygon.simplify(threshold=1.0)
simplified_polygon_truth = Polygon2D(*[points[i] for i in (3, 5, 7, 9)])
self.assertEqual(simplified_polygon, simplified_polygon_truth)
points = Vector2D.from_coordinates((0, 0), (0.1, 10.1), (0.2, 20.1))
polygon = Polygon2D(*points)
simplified_polygon = polygon.simplify(threshold=1.0)
self.assertIsNone(simplified_polygon)
